name: Survivor [C64]
description:
Can you survive?



Survivor is a thrilling throwback to the golden era of 80's arcade gaming. Step into a world overrun by zombies in this top-down shooter, where your survival hinges on quick reflexes, strategic planning, and a relentless trigger finger. As waves of undead close in, you'll need to master an array of weapons, utilize powerful bombs, and scavenge for critical loot to stay alive.

Game Overview:


In Survivor, you'll face relentless waves of zombies that grow larger and more challenging with each passing level. The fast-paced action and nostalgic pixel graphics will transport you back to the arcades of yesteryear. As you progress, you'll encounter formidable bosses with unique mechanics, adding a new layer of excitement and difficulty to the game.

Key Features:



  • Classic Arcade Action: Experience the authentic 80's arcade feel with modern gameplay enhancements.
  • Diverse Arsenal: Upgrade your weapons and unleash devastating bombs to obliterate the undead.
  • Challenging Waves: Battle through increasingly difficult zombie hordes and test your survival skills.
  • Epic Boss Fights: Take on unique bosses that introduce new challenges and require strategic thinking.
  • Loot and Power-Ups: Collect essential loot, extra lives, and special pickups like armor to gain the upper hand.
  • Retro Graphics and Sound: Enjoy pixel-perfect graphics and a soundtrack that perfectly captures the nostalgia of classic arcade games.

Are you ready to take on the undead and prove your survival skills? Grab your computer, load your weapons, and dive into the chaotic world of Survivor.
